<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 11"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[A Home in Every Port](/Feats.aspx?ID=2105) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Downtime" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=49" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 202 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Charisma 16

</column>

---

You have a reputation in towns and villages you've visited, and residents are always willing to open their doors to you. When in a town or village, during downtime, you can spend 8 hours to locate a resident willing to provide lodging for you and up to six allies for up to 24 hours at no charge. [The standard of living within the acquired lodging is comfortable, and square meals are provided at no cost](/equipment/services). After 24 hours, you must pay standard prices for further lodging and meals or use this feat again to find a new resident willing to host you.
name: A Home in Every Port
